---

**Note to Sponsors:**

Priority triage means we'll:
- Review your issue within 24 hours (business days)
- Provide initial response or triage plan
- Prioritize bug fixes and feature requests from sponsors
- Offer direct support via GitHub or preferred communication channel

For urgent/critical issues, you can also reach out via:
- GitHub Sponsors messaging
- Email (if provided in sponsor tier)

Thank you for supporting KCSI! ğŸ™
